name: Blessing of the Moons
entries: At 18th level, a shimmering veil of moonlight always covers you granting you the following benefits:

items: At the end of a long rest you gain temporary hit points equal to your sorcerer level.
You have resistance to radiant damage.
When you hit a creature with a spell you deal additional radiant damage equal to your proficiency bonus.
You can expend 2 sorcerer points as a bonus action to teleport up to 60 ft to a point you can see.
